Empty.after_created: Once your Note is created, you can find it in your [**Cozy Drive**](%{notesFolder})

Error.unshared_title: This share is no longer active
Error.unshared_text: The owner may have revoked this share. You can no longer edit a note at this address.

manifest.short_description: Cozy Notes is your personal and collaborative note-taking application.
manifest.long_description:
Notes is an online text editor that can already offer you to:

* Create your own notes with the essential features (bold, underlined, links, tables...)
* Fill and find your notes with you other documents in files of your personal Drive
* Edit easily your notes from all your devices
* Access your notes offline
* For the fans, use shortcuts and input in markdown format ... and even write with contacts together on the same note (coming soon)!
